name: customer-service-chatbot
description: Customer service chatbot with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && rimraf public && mkdir public && cp -r ../frontend/build/* public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm run dev"
